results.content:
Hi, I bought this course because it is the only one that deals with how to set up webapp with firebase.
The example is perfectly functional and beautiful on a local pc. But ... I would have liked something that I have already asked the author and that is how to configure webapp for heroku. I am sure he will implement it.Sorry for my English,I'm Italian.
Thanks!
